title: Ennai Saaithaale Lyrics Endrendrum Punnagai Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Ennai Saaithaalae
Singer(s): Hariharan, Shreya Ghoshal
Movie: Endrendrum Punnagai
Music: Harris Jayaraj
Lyrics: Thamarai

Ennai saaithaaley, uyir theyithaale
ini vazhveno inidhaaga
thadumaaraamal, tharai modhaamal
ini veelveno muludhaaga

idhal aalathil punnagai poothaale
en paavangal theerthaen
oh mazhai eerathil nanayaamal naan
veliyerathaan paarthaen

nadakira varai, nagargira tharai
adhanmel thavikiren
vizhigalin pirai vilugira thirai
athanaal thigaikiren

Netru pole vaanam, ada indru kooda neelam
en naatkal thaandidum
thalli poga ennum, kaal pakkam vandha pinnum
ketkaadhey yaar sollum.

paravai naaan siragu nee
naan kaatrai vella aasai kondaen
payanam nan valigal nee
naa ellai thaandi sella kandaen

Ennai saaithaaley, uyir theyithaale
ini vazhveno inidhaaga
thadumaaraamal, tharai modhaamal
ini veelveno muludhaaga

Malai vandhaal podhum
oru nootru pathil vegam
senthaangal polae kaayum

kaatru vandhu modhum
un kaigal endru thondrum
pin yemaatram theendum

thavipadhai maraikiren
en poiyai pooti vaithu kondaen
kanavile vizhikiren,
en kayil saami ondrai kandaen

Ennai saaithaaley, uyir theyithaale
ini vazhveno inidhaaga
thadumaaraamal, tharai modhaamal
ini veelveno muludhaaga

idhal aalathil punnagai poothaale
en paavangal theerthaen
oh mazhai eerathil nanayaamal naan
veliyerathaan paarthaai

nadakira varai, nagargira tharai
adhanmel thavikiren
vizhigalin pirai vilugira thirai
athanaal thigaikiren
